attributes.action: The Government & Universities to hold a discussion about the impact on students.
attributes.additional_details: You have failed to recognise how these restrictions has impacted Students.  Students are currently learning remotely, this is NOT a true reflection of the face-to-face taught tuition fee of £9,250+. Students are also paying up to £7000+ for accommodation that; they cannot commute to or from, is not their current residence and where there is no access to facilities. Talks are needed where these issues are highlighted and addressed.  A change for the future successors of this country is needed.
attributes.background: A lot of petitions have been "debated" without any changes, mainly resulting with this response "Universities are responsible for setting their own fees"  As a Full-Time student, this is not enough.  As a Government you have declared a third National Lockdown, with many restrictions.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
	
You may wish to sign some of these petitions: 

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285
